item.title: Enhance AWS S3 Data Security with Bucket Level Policy
item.author: Dong Guo | Damon
item.description: After restricted the source of S3 Bucket access requests through Bucket Level Policy, the data in AWS S3 Bucket can still be secured even if AKSK is compromised.

item.title: How to Generate Self-signed SSL Certificates
item.author: Dong Guo | Damon
item.description: It is also important to deploy HTTPS services for internal private domains.
